comment: Good Professor, if you show up to class and pay some attention you will be fine. Quizzes are online as well as half the tests. Two in-class exams and a cumulative final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: He was absolutely fantastic. Does a great job of teaching things. His lectures are complimentary to what is in the book so read the chapter before the lecture. Test are very reasonable. Has a British accent that makes you want to listen.

He is a great teacher! He truly cares about his students and wants them to understand and learn not just memorize the material. He will work with you if you participate and show a desire to do well. There will be some lecture heavy classes, but he tries to mix in other things so it's not boring. If you don't come to class you wont do well.
He is tough but fair. Totally accessible outside of class to help. Wants students to do well. Makes you think instead of memorize.
